Posts.Content: Hi can any one help had surgery breast cancer lump removed sent real lymph node removed breast cancer clear been told I need radium but borderline so my choice if I want chemo anyone else had this result?
Posts.Title: Jean

Posts.Content: Hi Linda just wondering why you only had 3 rounds of chemo are you classed as low risk as I have started chemo and all I get told is if I want to stop as I am intermediate and low risk of return I can stop at any time and move onto radium so confusing ? Good luck in your treatment x. Jeanie c
